content: I see. So, the interview is just one part of the process, and there are still several steps to go through after that. I'm glad I have a better understanding of what to expect now. Since I've waited for almost 6 months for this interview, I'm really hoping it goes smoothly and quickly from here on out. Do you think I'll be able to get a sense of how the interview went from the officer's demeanor or body language during the interview?
